mapper.sql: oc.id, oc.shop_id, oc.user_id, oc.good_specification_id,oc.good_specification_name,oc.good_specification_value,oc.goods_id, oc.goods_sn, oc.goods_name, oc.price, oc.`number`,oc.`checked`,oc.pic_url,oc.createtime, oc.modifytime,oc.dr,oc.weight_mode,oc.effect_flag
mapper.select: SELECT oc.id, oc.shop_id, oc.user_id, oc.good_specification_id,ogs.specification AS goodSpecificationName,ogs.value AS goodSpecificationValue,oc.goods_id, og.goods_sn, og.name goodsName, ogs.price, oc.`number`,oc.`checked`,ogs.pic_url,oc.createtime, oc.modifytime,oc.dr,oc.weight_mode,oc.effect_flag FROM order_cart oc INNER Join order_goods og ON oc.goods_id = og.id INNER Join order_goods_specification ogs ON ogs.id = oc.good_specification_id WHERE oc.dr = false AND oc.shop_id = #{shopId} AND oc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY oc.`checked` DESC, oc.`createtime` DESC

SELECT ogs.id,ogs.goods_id,ogs.specification, ogs.value,ogs.pic_url,ogs.modifier,ogs.creator,ogs.createtime, ogs.modifytime,ogs.dr FROM order_goods_specification ogs Inner JOIN order_goods og ON ogs.goods_id = og.id WHERE ogs.dr = false AND og.shop_id = #{shopId} AND ogs.goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT oc.id, oc.shop_id, oc.user_id, oc.good_specification_id,ogs.specification AS goodSpecificationName,ogs.value AS goodSpecificationValue,oc.goods_id, og.goods_sn, og.name goodsName, ogs.price, oc.`number`,oc.`checked`,ogs.pic_url,oc.createtime, oc.modifytime,oc.dr,oc.weight_mode,oc.effect_flag FROM order_cart oc INNER Join order_goods og ON oc.goods_id = og.id INNER Join order_goods_specification ogs ON ogs.id = oc.good_specification_id WHERE oc.dr = false AND oc.shop_id = #{shopId} AND oc.user_id = #{userId} AND oc.id = #{cartId}
